amendment.description: An amendment to indicate in the report from the Department of Defense to Congress whether such items or parts of purchases from foreign entities are available for purchasing in the United States.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Sutton amendment (A016). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the amendment proposed to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Sutton.
